name: Orbonaut
description:
ORBONAUT

Your job as an Orbonaut is to pick the very sought after orb crystals... But lurking around the Gem Orbs can be a dangerous place.

Getting there and being inside is quite easy, it's trying to get away from there that can be the problem.

Inside you can find the crystals and the Gem Crabs, The gem crabs are themselves pretty harmless, they will not harm you, but they will take back what you've stolen if they reach you.

Outside the orb you encounter the Orb Moon. It gravitates toward the crystals, so being outside with your backpack full, basically makes you into a moon magnet...

WHAT TO DO

- Collect crystals

- Stay away from the Gem Crabs

- Go outside to get past the Gem Crabs

- Keep an eye on your oxyygen whe you're outside

- Run faster than the Orb Moon

GAMEPLAY

- Left/Right arrow or A /D  to move

- Up/Down or W/S to exit and enter the orb

JAM INFO

- Entry for the Godot Wild Jam #46

- Made with Godot, Blender, Houdini  

- All assets where made for the jam but the fonts

  - Comfortaa

  - Righteous
